# Revision Template

Use this template when working on revisions after code review feedback.

## Revision Summary
**Issue/PR:** [#123 or PR link]  
**Original Developer:** [@username]  
**Reviewer:** [@reviewer_username]  
**Revision Version:** [1.0, 2.0, etc.]  
**Date:** [Date]

## Review Feedback Summary
[Summary of main feedback points from review]

## Changes Made

### Blocking Issues Addressed
- [ ] **Issue 1:** [Description of fix]
- [ ] **Issue 2:** [Description of fix]

### Non-Blocking Improvements Applied
- [ ] **Improvement 1:** [Description of change]
- [ ] **Improvement 2:** [Description of change]

### Changes Not Addressed
[If any feedback was not implemented, explain why]

- **Item 1:** [Reason]
- **Item 2:** [Reason]

## Verification

### Testing
- [ ] Existing tests still pass
- [ ] New tests added where needed
- [ ] Edge cases covered
- [ ] Manual testing completed

### Code Quality
- [ ] Followed project conventions
- [ ] Addressed all code smells
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] No new technical debt introduced

### Performance
- [ ] Performance impact verified
- [ ] No regressions introduced
- [ ] Optimization opportunities included

## Checklist
- [ ] All blocking issues resolved
- [ ] Code follows project standards
